abstract: United Talent Agency sells minority stake to activist hedge fund operator Jeffrey Ubben and acquires Agency Group.
lead_paragraph: The agency will use the investment of undisclosed size from the activist hedge fund operator for expansion, including the acquisition of a music agency.

headline.main: Jeffrey Ubben Buys Minority Stake in United Talent Agency
headline.print_headline: Business Briefing; Talent Agency Sells a Stake and Buys a Music Agency

snippet: The agency will use the investment of undisclosed size from the activist hedge fund operator for expansion, including the acquisition of a music agency.
